meanings.definition: A person who counts or lists items.
meanings.sent1: The enumerators went door to door to count the people in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The store hired enumerators to keep track of the inventory.
meanings.sent3: The enumerators at the grocery store accidentally counted the same apples twice!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like skilled enumerators, swiftly counting the coins in the jar.
meanings.sent5: The enumerators meticulously tallied each book in the library, one by one.

meanings.definition: A device or software used for counting or listing items.
meanings.sent1: The new electronic enumerators made the task of inventory management much easier.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in advanced enumerators to streamline their data collection process.
meanings.sent3: The quirky inventor created a talking enumerator that counted in a robotic voice.
meanings.sent4: The digital enumerator worked tirelessly, organizing the data with lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The enumerator hummed softly as it efficiently scanned each barcode.
